ygData.subject: Re: Hostage
ygData.msgSnippet: Flashing looks at the time running out on the counter. Dark looks at him insane with rage and blood lust starts to fire 4 Plasma blast at Flashing. As Flashing

Flashing looks at the time running out on the counter.

Dark looks at him insane with rage and blood lust starts to fire 4 Plasma 
blast at Flashing. 

As Flashing starts to back flip avoiding each blast one by one as the 4 one 
hit him driving him in the earth as his a his chest plate cracks.  He 
Launches into the air and grabs Tries to grab Darks leg.

As Dark feels Flashing grab his Leg dark tries to Fire at Flashing.

Flashing starts to spin around in a circle at momentum to him and dark as he 
tries to throw dark towards the earth.

Dark Flies toward the earth at speed way to high to counter hit the ground 
leaving a crater as his armored is marred and damaged. "That little brat.  My 
jets are damaged." 

Flashing Rockets towards the earth to try to hammer Dark.

Dark tries to Grab Flashing and Sling him over with his own weight and force. 

Flashing Flies over dark hitting several trees before crashing as Flashing 
seems to only be able to rise to one knee his armor looking just as bad.

Dark Limps over slowly "It is over" As he gather up a Plasma ball to Finish 
Flashing.
